p: This document describes how to upgrade a server from release 2.1.0 (which was installed from source) to release 2.1.1 of Hedgehog via packages.

ac:rich-text-body.p: Official support from installation from source is discontinued from 2.1.1

p.span: If desired, back up the existing installation (the directory structure in the User Guide is a useful reference) and database.

p: Stop refile and grok cron job running:

ac:structured-macro.ac:plain-text-body: sudo -u hedgegho crontab -e # Import XML data every 15 mins 00,15,30,45 * * * * <prefix>/bin/refile_and_grok.sh -c >> /var/log/hedgehog/refile_and_grok_xml_to_db.sh.log 2>&1

p: Comment out any other jobs that are about to run. If the dsc-extractor process is running wait for it to finish before continuing.
It is recommended to disable the web front end during upgrade e.g by enabling a holding page.

ul.li: Refer to section 2.1 of the 'Hedgehog Installation Guide' to install the required packages.

p: Installing from a package places some files in a different directory structure compared to installing from code.

ul.li:
Data - if it is desired to retain existing data (XML files, cached plots and RSSAC reports) then the existing <prefix>/var/hedgehog directory should be copied or linked (e.g. symbolically or via re-mounting) to the new location shown below
If this is not required then simply run the /usr/bin/hedgehogctl database_update_nodes script again to create the directory structure for upload of XML data in the new location AFTER completing step 2.1
Tools and scripts - those installed via source under <prefix> in bin and libexec/hedgehog are installed by the packages under /usr/ as shown below. Update any cron jobs or scripts accordingly.

td.p: 'www' directory containing cached plots and rssac reports

tr.td: Hedgehog tools scripts and DDL updates

p: Re-enable and test the web front end. Make sure to restart apache.

ac:rich-text-body.p: Remember to use the new script locations when re-enabling the cron jobs

p: Restart refile and grok cron job running:

ac:structured-macro.ac:plain-text-body: sudo -u hedgehog crontab -e # Import XML data every 15 mins 00,15,30,45 * * * * /usr/bin/refile_and_grok -c >> /var/log/hedgehog/refile_and_grok_xml_to_db.log 2>&1

p: Re-enable any other jobs that were disabled for the upgrade.
